members.signatureBeforeChange: public static FontData win32_new(LOGFONT data, int height)
members.signatureAfterChange: public static FontData win32_new(LOGFONT data, int height)
diff: -	 * Feature in Windows 98.  When setting the faceName,
-	 * Windows 98 null terminates the string but does not
-	 * clear the rest of the buffer while Windows NT does.
-	 * The fix is to get and set the name which fills the
-	 * rest of the faceName buffer with null.
